edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action

? ChangeSessionTimeoutAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.ChangeSessionTimeoutAction

  • public class ChangeSessionTimeoutAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to change the session timeout, sessionTimeout.jsp. Note that a change to this timeout only gets reflected on new sessions.
    ??:
    Andy Meneely
